text:
Ilija Vakić (; born 30 July 1932) is a Serbian politician. He was Chairman of the Executive Council of the Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija within SFR Yugoslavia from May 1967 to May 1974.
He was a member of the League of Communists of Kosovo. He was replaced by Bogoljub Nedeljković.

annotations.surface_form: Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija
